scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "npm start -w app" "npm run local-services" "npm run launch" "holochain-playground"
scripts.package: npm run build:zomes && sh optimize-wasms.sh && npm run package -w app && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch: echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/gather.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
